description: Commands to manage app insights settings for the container apps environment.

commands.name: az containerapp env telemetry app-insights delete
commands.summary: Delete container apps environment telemetry app insights settings.
commands.syntax:
az containerapp env telemetry app-insights delete --name
                                                  --resource-group
                                                  [--no-wait]
                                                  [--yes]
examples: az containerapp env telemetry app-insights delete -n MyContainerappEnvironment -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az containerapp env telemetry app-insights set
commands.summary: Create or update container apps environment telemetry app insights settings.
commands.syntax:
az containerapp env telemetry app-insights set --name
                                               --resource-group
                                               [--connection-string]
                                               [--enable-open-telemetry-logs {false, true}]
                                               [--enable-open-telemetry-traces {false, true}]
                                               [--no-wait]
examples:
az containerapp env telemetry app-insights set -n MyContainerappEnvironment -g MyResourceGroup \
    --connection-string connectionString --enable-open-telemetry-traces true --enable-open-telemetry-logs true

commands.name: az containerapp env telemetry app-insights show
commands.summary: Show container apps environment telemetry app insights settings.
commands.syntax:
az containerapp env telemetry app-insights show --name
                                                --resource-group
examples: az containerapp env telemetry app-insights show -n MyContainerappEnvironment -g MyResourceGroup
